Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans are shocked that you did not keep Tony Gwynn on the team!
The overall fan interest almost crashed!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

The overall fan interest decreases a lot!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director
